title: What to Know if You Want to Buy the Stock Market Dip
sub_head: The Federal Reserve is giving the stock market a fright as it ramps up its efforts to control inflation. The volatility may last longer than investors have come to expect over the past few decadesâ€”but you can still prosper with discipline, patience and courage.
body:
Investors have long shared a dream: that the Federal Reserve will always flood the markets with cheap money whenever asset prices fall too far.
In 2022, that dream has turned to a nightmare.
